title: Set max-width to 300px for inline images and GIFs

requirements.summary: Set max-width to 300px for inline images and GIFs in their non-expanded state in the MessageBubble component
acceptanceCriteria: Inline images in messages display with a maximum width of 300px when not expanded
Inline GIFs in messages display with a maximum width of 300px when not expanded
No other styles or functionality are modified

file_operations.description: Update the max-width style for inline images and GIFs to 300px in their non-expanded state. Locate the image and GIF rendering logic and modify only the max-width property on the img or container element that displays the collapsed/non-expanded media. Ensure the expanded state (if using a modal or full-size view) remains unchanged. Do not modify any other styles, functionality, reactions, embeds, or layout logic.
